Title: Uppina Kagada
Writer: B. Suresh, B. Suresha, Chethana Teerthahalli
Actors: Apoorva, Apoorva Bharadwaj, T.S. Nagabharana, Mandya Ramesh
Plot: A young girl goes in search of her father and meets a man on a river bank. That meet leaves her with a lot of questions and also few solutions to live in a pluralistic society.
